body: He just watches as Ren has sex with her manager not once but a few times... He doesn't do shit about it.
Way too many sex scenes, what is this? A doujinshi?....oh wait...

I like the overall of the current story(1-65) but it's not good enough to be one of my favourites. And please do NOT add another rape scene, I literally got instantly mad when I saw that particular part but good thing it was just a dream of Kyohie. And it's interesting that both Kyohie and Ren ignored the fact that being in a relationship is a bad thing(because they're cousins). And let it stay that way I like Thier relationship just as this.
